import numpy as np

Line plot

x = [1, 2, 3, 4,10]
y = [10, 15, 17, 20,30]
plt.plot(x,y)

plt.xlabel('x-label')
plt.ylabel('y-label')
plt.title('My Title')
plt.yticks([0,5,10,15,20,25,30,40],
